author: Kyle Morris
title: Newt Gingrich: Trump Will Be Remembered as ‘Historic Figure’ for Coronavirus Response
description: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich stated Thursday that President Donald Trump will be remembered by future generations as a "historic figure" for his response to the deadly coronavirus pandemic that has swept the world.
content:
Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich stated Thursday that President Donald Trump will be remembered by future generations as a “historic figure” for his response to the deadly coronavirus pandemic that has swept the world.
